name: NOTION__GET_PAGE
description: Retrieves a Page object using the ID specified. Returns page properties (limited to 25 references per property) but not page content. For page content, use the Retrieve block children endpoint. For properties with >25 references, use the Retrieve a page property endpoint. If page's parent is a database, properties conform to database schema. If not, only title is available.

page_id.description: The ID of the page to retrieve.

filter_properties.description: A list of page property value IDs associated with the page. Use this param to limit the response to a specific page property value or values. To retrieve multiple properties, specify each page property ID. For example: ?filter_properties=iAk8&filter_properties=b7dh.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__SEARCH_PAGES
description: Searches all pages that have been shared with an integration. Returns pages that have titles matching the query.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

query.description: The text to search for in page titles.

start_cursor.description: Cursor for pagination. If supplied, limits results to those after the cursor.

page_size.description: Number of results to return. Maximum: 100

name: NOTION__TOGGLE_PAGE_ARCHIVE
description: Archives or restores a page. Note: Cannot archive workspace-level pages via API, and the API does not support permanently deleting pages.

page_id.description: The ID of the page to archive or restore

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

archived.description: Set to true to archive the page, false to restore it from trash

name: NOTION__RESTORE_PAGE
description: Restores a page from trash.

page_id.description: The ID of the page to restore from trash

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

archived.description: Set to false to restore the page from trash

name: NOTION__LIST_USERS
description: Returns a paginated list of Users for the workspace. Does not include guests. Requires user information capabilities.

start_cursor.description: If supplied, this endpoint will return a page of results starting after the cursor provided. If not supplied, this endpoint will return the first page of results.

page_size.description: The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__GET_USER
description: Retrieves a User using the ID specified. Requires user information capabilities.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__GET_ME
description: Retrieves the bot User associated with the API token provided in the authorization header.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__CREATE_PAGE
description: Creates a new page that is a child of an existing page or database. If the parent is a database, properties must match the parent database's schema.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use.

parent.description: The parent page or database where the new page will be created. Use EITHER database_id OR page_id, not both.

database_id.description: The ID of the database this page belongs to (for database entries)

page_id.description: The ID of the page this page belongs to (for child pages)

properties.description: Page properties. For child pages, typically only 'title' is needed. For database entries, properties must match the database schema. Title format: {'title': [{'type': 'text', 'text': {'content': 'Page Title'}}]}

title.description: Page title as rich text array. Format: [{'type': 'text', 'text': {'content': 'Title Text'}}]

children.description: Page content as an array of block objects. Common types: paragraph, heading_1, heading_2, heading_3, bulleted_list_item, numbered_list_item

paragraph.description: Paragraph block content. Use when type is 'paragraph'

external.description: External file details when type is 'external'

name: NOTION__CREATE_TOKEN
description: Create an OAuth token for authentication.

code.description: Authorization code received from the authorization server

redirect_uri.description: Redirect URI used in the authorization request

name: NOTION__INTROSPECT_TOKEN
description: Introspect an OAuth token to get information about its validity and scope.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__REVOKE_TOKEN
description: Revoke an OAuth token.

name: NOTION__REFRESH_TOKEN
description: Refresh an OAuth token.

name: NOTION__CREATE_DATABASE
description: Creates a new database as a child of an existing page.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

parent.description: Parent page where database will be created

title.description: Database title as rich text array

name: NOTION__GET_DATABASE
description: Retrieves a database object using the ID specified.

database_id.description: The ID of the database to retrieve

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__UPDATE_DATABASE
description: Updates the existing database object using the ID specified.

database_id.description: The ID of the database to update

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

title.description: Database title as rich text array

properties.description: Database schema - property definitions to update

name: NOTION__QUERY_DATABASE
description: Gets a list of Pages contained in the database, filtered and ordered according to the filter conditions and sort criteria provided.

database_id.description: The ID of the database to query

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

filter.description: Filter conditions for the database query

page_size.description: Number of results to return. Maximum: 100

name: NOTION__GET_BLOCK
description: Retrieves a Block object using the ID specified.

block_id.description: The ID of the block to retrieve

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__GET_BLOCK_CHILDREN
description: Returns a paginated array of child Block objects contained in the block using the ID specified.

block_id.description: The ID of the block whose children to retrieve

start_cursor.description: If supplied, this endpoint will return a page of results starting after the cursor provided.

page_size.description: The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__APPEND_BLOCK_CHILDREN
description: Creates and appends new children blocks to the parent block_id specified.

block_id.description: The ID of the block to append children to

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

children.description: Array of block objects to append as children

name: NOTION__UPDATE_BLOCK
description: Updates the content for the specified block_id based on the block type.

block_id.description: The ID of the block to update

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

archived.description: Set to true to archive (delete) the block

name: NOTION__DELETE_BLOCK
description: Sets a Block object, including page blocks, to archived: true using the ID specified.

block_id.description: The ID of the block to delete

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__GET_PAGE_PROPERTY
description: Retrieves a page property item for a given page ID and property ID.

page_id.description: The ID of the page containing the property

property_id.description: The ID of the property to retrieve

start_cursor.description: If supplied, this endpoint will return a page of results starting after the cursor provided.

page_size.description: The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__UPDATE_PAGE_PROPERTIES
description: Updates page property values for the specified page.

page_id.description: The ID of the page to update properties for

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

properties.description: Page properties to update. The keys should match the property names or IDs from the page.

external.description: External file details when type is 'external'

name: NOTION__CREATE_COMMENT
description: Creates a comment in a page or existing discussion thread.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

parent.description: Parent of the comment - either a page or a discussion thread

page_id.description: ID of the page to comment on

discussion_id.description: ID of the discussion thread to reply to

rich_text.description: Comment content as rich text array

name: NOTION__GET_COMMENTS
description: Retrieves a list of un-resolved Comment objects from a page or block.

start_cursor.description: If supplied, this endpoint will return a page of results starting after the cursor provided.

page_size.description: The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__GET_COMMENT
description: Retrieves a Comment object using the ID specified.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name: NOTION__CREATE_FILE_UPLOAD
description: Creates a file upload URL that can be used to upload files to Notion.

Notion-Version.description: The version of the Notion API to use. Defaults to 2022-06-28.

name.description: Name of the file including the file extension
